definition: Angkor Wat, temple complex in Cambodia
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods

sentences.english: Angkor Wat has awed visitors since it was first built in the early twelfth century.
sentences.chinese: 吳哥窟在12世紀早期初建時就令參觀者們敬畏不已。

sentences.english: The 12th century ruins include Angkor Wat and Angkor Thom.
sentences.chinese: 12世紀的遺址包括小吳哥窟與大吳哥城。

sentences.english: Mausoleum of the level of stone temple architecture, similar to Angkor and Cambodia.
sentences.chinese: 陵廟的層級石雕建築，與柬埔寨吳哥窟相似。

sentences.english: At the main entrance, I admire the achievement of Angkor Wat's ancient architects.
sentences.chinese: 我鵠立在主進口處，讚揚古代吳哥窟構築師的成績。

sentences.english: A silhouette of the Angkor Wat viewed at sunrise with its reflection on the water's surface.
sentences.chinese: 日出的吳哥窟的水中倒影。

sentences.english: In this way, this walk reminds of Siem Reap’s Ta Prohm temple near Angkor Wat.
sentences.chinese: 就這樣，我不禁想起了吳哥窟附近暹粒的塔普倫寺來。

sentences.english: These droughts, he realized, corresponded to the time of Angkor’s fall.
sentences.chinese: 他意識到，這些乾旱從時間上與吳哥窟的毀滅相符。

sentences.english: One of the many faces at Angkor Thom.
sentences.chinese: 吳哥窟裏很多面相中的一個。

sentences.english: Lion statues standing at the stairs of the Angkor Wat temple.
sentences.chinese: 獅子雕在吳哥窟廟宇的臺階旁。

sentences.english: Angkor Wat Tower's stairs are steep to climb.
sentences.chinese: 吳哥窟塔攀爬的臺階很陡。

sentences.english: Dogs soaking up the morning sun at Angkor Wat.
sentences.chinese: 狗沉浸在吳哥窟的朝陽中。

definition: Chiang Mai, second city of Thailand
Malacca or Melaka (town and state in Malaysia), also strait between Malaysia and Sumatra
to travel around (the world, a country etc)
to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
Cebu, a province (and a city) in the Philippines (Tw)
lit. flower viewing from horseback (idiom); fig. superficial understanding from cursory observation/to make a quick judgment based on inadequate information
